title: What rank do i need to get a PBE Account?
body:
I try every nearly every season to get a PBE Account, with out any success.
What rank do i need to get a PBE Account or do i need to be even less toxic?
I really do need an answer :c

replies.body: I don't have any details on how to get into the PBE beyond what's provided in our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  I'm not aware of any rank that would guarantee you a spot on the PBE.  I know that you've waited a while, and hope some luck comes your way soon!
